name: Duck Home Parties
description:
''It's a chaotic world of 2020, and you're a daddy duck in a ducks' world. Your wife is waiting for you at home, mind I say very angry, because you forgot your tasks for the birthday party of your 10 beautiful ducklings. 

You have to get your ducklings from school and get to your house before the party starts and save them from themselves and from the dangers of the city. But oh boy, isn't being a father very challenging, especially when your children gets distracted very easily. ''

Hello from newx team! We started this game as a game jam after our hangover from new years eve celebration from 2021. We made the demo of the game in 20 days. However we liked it a lot that we'll start over in order to make it a full game. If you like to see this game grow, we would appreciate your help by filling our Playtester survey. 

Thanks a lot!

Here's our Twitter to check out more about us and the game.
